parameters.name: doTrails
parameters.description: Whether to do the trail-making test

parameters.name: doCube
parameters.description: Whether to draw the cube-drawing test

parameters.name: doMemory
parameters.description: Whether to do the forced-choice memory test

parameters.name: doNaming
parameters.description: Whether to do the animal naming test

parameters.name: doSerialRecall
parameters.description: Whether to do forward and backward serial recall

parameters.name: doGoNoGo
parameters.description: Whether to do the letter go-nogo task

parameters.name: doSemanticOddball
parameters.description: Whether to do the semantic oddball task

parameters.name: doSerialSubtraction
parameters.description: Whether to do serial subtractio (backward arithmetic).

parameters.name: useRandom
parameters.description: Whether to use random stimuli when possible for better retestability
